How to use the app

For desktop

↑ - rotate the block, ↓ - move down, ←/→ - left/right
space or button - set pause
backspace or - restart the game

For mobile

short touch - rotate the block, long touch - move down fast
swipe left/right to move the block
button - set pause
- restart the game

You can see the next block and your current score at the bottom of the page.
